channel.title: svnignore on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in svnignore on Mark Needham

item.title: Ignore file in Svn
item.description: I spent a bit of time this afternoon marveling at the non intuitiveness of working out how to ignore files in Svn. Normally I’d just use Tortoise SVNas it makes it so easy for you but I really wanted to know how to do it from the shell! After a bit of Googling and conversation with a colleagueI think I have it figured out to some extent. If you only have one pattern or file that you want to ignore then the following command should do the trick.
